definition: one of the given (options etc)/the first/firstly
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to know the first, but not know the second (idiom); only partial information
pinyin: zhi3 zhi1 qi2 yi1 , bu4 zhi1 qi2 er4

sentences.english: The first one is the construction of the Oberlin Student Center.
sentences.chinese: 其一，建构奥柏林学生活动中心。

sentences.english: One is afraid to beat his wife because his wife is likely to lose another of the lost earnings.
sentences.chinese: 其一是不敢打老婆，因为很可能会赔了夫人又丢财。

sentences.english: But do we really have to choose between the two?
sentences.chinese: 但是两者之间真的必选其一？

sentences.english: The caller complained, “I’ve been sad all my life.
sentences.chinese: 来访者控诉道，“终其一生，我都悲伤难抑。

sentences.english: What would follow if we take a naturalist approach as proposed by Rorty in these societies?
sentences.chinese: 罗蒂怎么能够拒斥其一而保留其二呢？

sentences.english: Replacement sleeves are made with one flange end slightly softer than the other.
sentences.chinese: 用来更换的套管其一端的法兰比另一端稍微柔软一些。

sentences.english: Rule No.11: Be nice to nerds. You may end up working for them.
sentences.chinese: 善待卑微的人，你可终其一生都在为其工作。

sentences.english: For one, superoxide is only one of several free radical species in the body.
sentences.chinese: 其一，超氧化物只是人体中众多自由基中的一种。

sentences.english: One involves having the recipient pay a COD charge; that’s “cash on delivery.”
sentences.chinese: 其一是让收件人支付费用的“货到付现”法。

sentences.english: Rabbit has its fixed features of life, one nocturnal movement.
sentences.chinese: 家兔有其固定的生活特性，其一昼伏夜动。

sentences.english: One is that a RFB(Radial Basis Function) fuzzy neural network is improved.
sentences.chinese: 其一是改进的径向基函数模糊神经网络。

sentences.english: All his life he will work.
sentences.chinese: 终其一生，他都会工作不停。

sentences.english: The first is to overturn the idea that architecture means shelfware documents.
sentences.chinese: 其一，转变架构就是摆在架子上的文档的错误观念。

sentences.english: They cite the misdeeds of one well-known Sanlu poisonous milk powder incident.
sentences.chinese: 他们列举的劣行其一三鹿毒奶粉事件世人皆知。

sentences.english: For rone thing, I'm desirous of working with a large hotel like yours.
sentences.chinese: 其一，我想在像你们这样的大大宾馆工作。

sentences.english: Throughout his life, we are all looking for happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我们终其一生，都在寻找幸福的路。

definition: same as 總而言之|总而言之[zong3 er2 yan2 zhi1]
in a nutshell/to put it briefly
